# URLCache.StoragePolicy.allowed

**Case**

Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is allowed without restriction.

## Declaration

```swift
case allowed
```

## Discussion



## Policies

- **URLCache.StoragePolicy.allowedInMemoryOnly**: Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is allowed; however storage should be restricted to memory only.
- **URLCache.StoragePolicy.notAllowed**: Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is not allowed in any fashion, either in memory or on disk.
